required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy of Kinesio Taping on Lymphedema Following Head and Neck Cancer Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy of Kinesio Taping on Neck Lymphedema Following Head and Neck Cancer Therapy: Double Blind Randomized Placebo Controlled Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Prof. Dr. Cemil Tascıoglu Education and Research Hospital Organization

clinical_study.source: Prof. Dr. Cemil Tascıoglu Education and Research Hospital Organization

brief_summary.textblock: Purpose off the study is investigating to efficacy of kinesio taping on neck lymphedema after the head and neck cancer therapy.

detailed_description.textblock: The neck lymphedema is a multidirectional process that depends on lymphatic circulation issues. The lymphedema can be treated using such as therapies, drugs or surgeries. There are few techniques for treatment of neck lymphedema and also in our best knowledge the kinesio taping therapy on lymphedema following neck cancer therapy had not been investigated or published. The study will assess the efficacy of kinesio taping in neck lymphedema with manual therapy after the head and neck cancer treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: The values of diameter of lymphedema of neck with face
primary_outcome.description: The diameters of upper, middle and lower points of neck were measured with tailor meter by a Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation professionals (measure unit is cm).

primary_outcome.measure: The values of diameter of lymphedema of neck with face
primary_outcome.description: The diameters of upper, middle and lower points of neck and two points of face were measured with tailor meter by a Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation professionals (measure unit is cm).

primary_outcome.measure: The values of diameter of lymphedema of neck with face
primary_outcome.description: The diameters of upper, middle and lower points of neck and two points of face were measured with tailor meter by a Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation professionals (measure unit is cm). The changes were assessed from baseline neck diameter at end of treatment and after one month.

primary_outcome.measure: The values of diameter of lymphedema of neck with face
primary_outcome.description: The diameters of upper, middle and lower points of neck were measured with tailor meter by a Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation professionals (measure unit is cm). The changes were assessed from baseline neck diameter at end of treatment and after one month.

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of Quality of Life Questionnaire-Head and Neck 35
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed by Quality of Life Questionnaire-Head and Neck 35 that a self questionnaire in head and neck cancer patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 100. The high scores were worst low scores were good health.

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of Quality of Life Questionnaire-Head and Neck 35
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed by Quality of Life Questionnaire-Head and Neck 35 that a self questionnaire in head and neck cancer patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 100. The high scores were worst low scores were good health.

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of Quality of Life Questionnaire-Head and Neck 35
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed by Quality of Life Questionnaire-Head and Neck 35 that a self questionnaire in head and neck cancer patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 100. The high scores were worst low scores were good health.

primary_outcome.measure: The scores of head and neck external lymphedema rating scale
primary_outcome.description: They were assessed by M. D. Anderson head and neck lymphedema rating scale in head and neck cancer patients. Composite Score ranges from 0 ( low edema) to 3 (high level edema).

primary_outcome.measure: The scores of head and neck external lymphedema rating scale
primary_outcome.description: They were assessed by M. D. Anderson head and neck lymphedema rating scale in head and neck cancer patients. Composite Score ranges from 0 ( low edema) to 3 (high level edema).

primary_outcome.measure: The scores of head and neck external lymphedema rating scale
primary_outcome.description: They were assessed by M. D. Anderson head and neck lymphedema rating scale in head and neck cancer patients. Composite Score ranges from 0 ( low edema) to 3 (high level edema).

primary_outcome.measure: The scores of head and neck external lymphedema rating scale
primary_outcome.description: They were assessed by M. D. Anderson head and neck lymphedema rating scale in head and neck cancer patients. Composite Score ranges from 0 ( low edema) to 3 (high level edema).

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of Patterson larynx pharynx internal edema scale
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed with Flexible Endoscopic Evaluation Study. Flexible Endoscopic Evaluation Study results were scored on Patterson larynx pharynx edema scale. The scores of scale were no, mild, moderate and severe . The high grade symptom scores were worst, low scores were good health

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of Patterson larynx pharynx edema scale
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed with Fiberoptic Endoscopic Evaluation Study. Flexible Endoscopic Evaluation Study results were scored on Patterson larynx pharynx edema scale. The scores of scale were no, mild, moderate and severe. The high grade symptom scores were worst, low scores were good health

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of Patterson larynx pharynx edema scale
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed with Fiberoptic Endoscopic Evaluation Study. Flexible Endoscopic Evaluation Study results were scored on Patterson larynx pharynx edema scale. The scores of scale were no, mild, moderate and severe. The high grade symptom scores were worst, low scores were good health

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of Patterson larynx pharynx edema scale
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed with Fiberoptic Endoscopic Evaluation Study. Flexible Endoscopic Evaluation Study results were scored on Patterson larynx pharynx edema scale. The scores of scale were no, mild, moderate and severe. The high grade symptom scores were worst, low scores were good health

secondary_outcome.description: Age, gender, history of smoke, history of morbidities, diagnosis, stage, therapies of cancer, lymphedema stages were noted

arm_group.description: Kinesio tex gold tape was applied to neck localised lymphedema as stretched. Kinesio tape maintained during consecutive days and also were re applied with manual lymphatic drainage therapy as 5 times first week, and afterthat 2 times for 3 weeks (total 4 weeks)

Kinesio tex gold tape was applied to neck localised lymphedema as no-stretched. Kinesio tape maintained during consecutive days and also were re applied with manual lymphatic drainage therapy as 5 times first week, and afterthat 2 times for 3 weeks (total 4 weeks)

intervention.description: The Kinesio Tex Gold is a kinesio tape that had been certified and patented.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age between 18-70 years
- External neck lymphedema
- Head and neck cancer treatment patients
- patients who have not open wound on neck
- Patients who were accept to consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- Mental disorders Cognitive limitations Pregnancy Out of age 18-70 years old Patients who were not accept to consent form

reference.citation: Kasawara KT, Mapa JMR, Ferreira V, Added MAN, Shiwa SR, Carvas N Jr, Batista PA. Effects of Kinesio Taping on breast cancer-related lymphedema: A meta-analysis in clinical trials. Physiother Theory Pract. 2018 May;34(5):337-345. doi: 10.1080/09593985.2017.1419522. Epub 2018 Jan 8. Review.

Deng J, Murphy BA, Dietrich MS, Wells N, Wallston KA, Sinard RJ, Cmelak AJ, Gilbert J, Ridner SH. Impact of secondary lymphedema after head and neck cancer treatment on symptoms, functional status, and quality of life. Head Neck. 2013 Jul;35(7):1026-35. doi: 10.1002/hed.23084. Epub 2012 Jul 12.
